# Rust Koans - Workspace Instructions

This is a comprehensive Rust tutorial project designed for Python developers using TDD methodology.

## Project Structure
- Cargo workspace with 10 koans (01-10)
- Each koan focuses on a specific Rust concept
- Tests fail initially, students implement solutions
- All documentation in Spanish

## Development Guidelines
- Use latest stable Rust (1.75+)
- Follow TDD principles
- Include Python comparisons in comments
- Provide hints and TODOs, not solutions
- Keep pedagogical approach clear

## Completed Steps
- [x] Project scaffolding initiated
